p: Cocoa production in 2015–16 during the ENSO-related drought (277 kg ha -1) was the lowest recorded since 1990. At a country scale yield decreased from 400 kg ha -1 before the drought to 277 kg ha -1 after; in Para state yield decreased from 860 kg ha -1 to 490 kg ha -1, in Bahia state yield decreased from 300 kg ha -1 to 200 kg ha -1. Production for Barro Preto was not available for 2016–2017).
